item.title: Are subscription models the future?
item.description: Overview Spotify, Amazon Prime, Netflix. These are some of the corporate giants who have found incredible success in pursuing subscription-based services for their platforms.

item.title: Alpina - what now?
item.description: Overview BMW has finally added legendary tuner Alpina to its brand portfolio, after more than 50 years of collaboration at its Buchloe plant in Bavaria.
